struct asmjit::x86x64::MmReg
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 64-bit Mm register.

Public Functions

MmReg()

Create a dummy Mm register.

MmReg(const MmReg & other)

Create a reference to other Mm register.

MmReg(uint32_t type, uint32_t index, uint32_t size)

Create a custom Mm register.

MmReg(const _NoInit &)

Create non-initialized Mm register.

MmReg clone()

Clone BaseReg operand.

MmReg & setSize(uint32_t size)

Set register size.

MmReg & setCode(uint32_t code)

Set register code.

MmReg & setCode(uint32_t type, uint32_t index)

Set register type and index.

MmReg & setType(uint32_t type)

Set register type.

MmReg & setIndex(uint32_t index)

Set register index.
